summary: The package supplies core utilities for managing Open Library lists. It aggregates and ranks subject, place, person, and timestamp data from entity mappings to generate prioritized subject collections, and offers generic helpers to pull authors, seeds, and subjects from various data structures. It also provides mixin support for the List model, including a seed abstraction for catalog items, cached property mechanisms, cross‑product generation, value sorting, and subject retrieval, all aimed at efficient list creation and manipulation.
business_intent: Enable robust creation, ranking, and manipulation of user‑generated and system‑generated book lists within Open Library, improving discovery, recommendation, and organization of catalog content.
